body:
See https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/16003#issuecomment-622503085 and https://travis-ci.org/github/spack/spack/jobs/682049262

This PR will have to be reopened (or rather a duplicate PR will have to be created and updated) to allow https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/15666 to proceed
title: Revert "Testing: fix unintended interactions between tests (#16003)"
